name: company_research_report
description: Generate comprehensive company research reports from web search data

arguments.name: company_name
arguments.description: Name of the company being researched

arguments.name: analyst_name
arguments.description: Name of the analyst conducting the research (use 'AI Research Assistant')

arguments.name: industry
arguments.description: Industry sector of the company (extract from search results)

arguments.name: company_description
arguments.description: Comprehensive company description from search data

arguments.name: founded
arguments.description: Company founding information (use 'Information not available' if missing)

arguments.name: headquarters
arguments.description: Company headquarters location (use 'Information not available' if missing)

arguments.name: website
arguments.description: Company website URL (extract from search results or use 'Not available')

arguments.name: key_facts
arguments.description: Key business facts and highlights from search data

arguments.name: business_analysis
arguments.description: Business model, market position, and competitive analysis

arguments.name: investment_notes
arguments.description: Investment considerations and potential (generate based on available data)

arguments.name: risk_factors
arguments.description: Key risk factors and business challenges

arguments.name: search_query
arguments.description: The search query used for this research

arguments.name: data_quality
arguments.description: Assessment of data completeness and reliability
